ovdesc.p: This application defines the soft conditions for determining product types, batching and change product conditions for the bulk upload of invoices done thru' EB.FILE.UPLOAD.
ID should be in the format:
for defining product update and auto batch conditions.
For defining change product rules when product change needs to be triggered for bulk registers based on preset conditions.
Change product condition will be applicable for registers created manually and uploaded records.

desc.p: Free text field to record the description of the rule defined.
Specifies the default product type to be used when conditions defined to determine product type is not satisfied.
Must be valid product from BL.TYPE.
Not allowed when ID ACTION = "BATCH".
Mandatory when ID ACTION = "PRODUCT".
Specifies the mandatory conditions for batching of invoices.
System would default following mandatory conditions and in addition user can define additional mandatory conditions.
CURRENCY
LIABILITY CUSTOMER
PRODUCT TYPE
Must be valid field in BL.REGISTER.
Not allowed when ID ACTION = "PRODUCT".
Specifies product type to be updated based on the conditions defined in the DECIS.FIELD to DECISION.TO fields.
Must be valid product from BL.TYPE application.
Not allowed when ID ACTION = "BATCH".
Mandatory when conditions is defined in DECIS.FIELD to DECISION.TO fields.
Identifies the valid name defined in standard selection of BL.REGISTER application.Local subroutine can be attached to define conditions.
Specifies the condition to be evaluated for the field defined in DECIS.FIELD.
Allowed values are
EQ,NE,GT,LT,GE,LE,LK,UL,RG,NR
Mandatory input if local subroutine is not attached in DECIS.FIELD.
Specifies the constant which the value derived from DECIS.FIELD is compared to.
Mandatory input if DECISION.FIELD is defined.
Not allowed if if local subroutine is attached in DECIS.FIELD.
Specifies the upper value used for field value comparisons based on ranges where the DECISION field is defined as NR or RG.
Not allowed if DECISION is not RG or NR.
Not allowed if if local subroutine is attached in DECIS.FIELD.
